General.Name: Burin Gold Corp
General.Description: Infinico Metals Corp. engages in the identification, acquisition, and exploration of precious and base metals in Canada. It owns 100% interest in the Hickey's Pond " Paradise gold property that consists of 636 claims covering a total area of 15,900 hectares located in the Burin Peninsula of Newfoundland, Canada. The company was formerly known as Burin Gold Corp. and changed its name to Infinico Metals Corp. in August 2023. Infinico Metals Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 210-1820 Fir Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6J 3B1
